org.accada.epcis.repository.query
Class QuerySubscription

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.epcis.repository.query.QuerySubscription
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, EpcisQueryCallbackInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
QuerySubscriptionScheduled
public class QuerySubscription
extends java.lang.Object
implements EpcisQueryCallbackInterface, java.io.Serializable

Implements a subscription to a query. Created upon using subscribe() on the querying interface side.

Author:
Alain Remund, Arthur van Dorp, Marco Steybe
See Also:

Constructor Detail

QuerySubscription

public QuerySubscription(java.lang.String subscriptionID,
                         QueryParams queryParams,
                         java.lang.String dest,
                         java.lang.Boolean reportIfEmpty,
                         java.util.GregorianCalendar initialRecordTime,
                         java.util.GregorianCalendar lastTimeExecuted,
                         java.lang.String queryName)
Constructor to be used when recreating from storage.

Parameters:
subscriptionID - subscriptionID.
queryParams - Query parameters.
dest - Destination URI.
reportIfEmpty - Whether to report when nothing changed.
initialRecordTime - Time from when on events should be reported on first execution.
lastTimeExecuted - Last time the query got executed.
queryName - queryName.
Method Detail

executeQuery

public void executeQuery()
Runs the query assigned to this subscription. Advances lastTimeExecuted.

callbackResults

public void callbackResults(QueryResults results)
Delivers the results of a standing query to the subscriber when the query executed normally.

Specified by:
callbackResults in interface EpcisQueryCallbackInterface
Parameters:
results - The results of the execution of a standing query.

callbackImplementationException

public void callbackImplementationException(ImplementationException ie)
Delivers the results of a standing query to the subscriber when the query resulted in a ImplementationException.

Specified by:
callbackImplementationException in interface EpcisQueryCallbackInterface
Parameters:
ie - The ImplementationException thrown during execution of a standing query.
